mapper.select: SELECT a.subject_data_no subjectDataNo ,b.subject_no subjectNo ,a.member_id memberId ,a.subject_data_title subjectDataTitle ,a.create_date createDate FROM subject_data AS a LEFT JOIN subject AS b ON a.subject_data_no = b.subject_no WHERE b.subject_no = #{subjectNo} LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
